scripts.dev:all: concurrently "npm run dev:platform" "npm run dev:backend" "npm run dev"
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd anders-survey-platform && npm install && cd client && npm install && cd ../../anders-survey-backend && npm install
scripts.lint: cd anders-survey-platform && npm run lint 2>/dev/null || echo 'No lint script' && cd ../anders-survey-backend && npm run lint 2>/dev/null || echo 'No lint script'
scripts.clean: rm -rf node_modules && rm -rf anders-survey-platform/node_modules && rm -rf anders-survey-platform/client/node_modules && rm -rf anders-survey-backend/node_modules
